title: Mon Post Show (03-28-22)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (03-28-22)
description:
Bobby talks about the Oscars winners last night. We talk about our worst movie theater experiences. Mike D had an awkward encounter at the movie theater. Raymundo is thinking of staying at the radio station to save money on gas. Bobby gives Lunchbox a sure-fire way to make the news. Raymundo reveals something that will happen in the next year.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
